question: Which of the following started a Yarn Bank, the first of its kind, in Karnataka in March 2019?
explanation: On 27 March 2019, in order to avoid fluctuation in yarn prices, Ministry of Textiles, Union Government started Yarn bank, a first of its kind in Karnataka, to help thousand of weavers at the Mysore Powerloom Silk Manufacturers Cooperative Society by ensuring a steady supply of silk yarn and zari.
